sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ClaimsUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>1. Veryfies if the email syntax is correct.</description><name>ClaimsUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ClaimsUtils = Class.create();
ClaimsUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
validateEmailAddress: function(emailStr) {
    emailStr = emailStr + '';
    if(emailStr.match(/^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/)){
        return true;
    }
    else return false;
} });]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-16 16:54:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>dea50bc9db60201061122bfa4b961908</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ClaimsUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Reclamation" source="f2e2f64ddb20201061122bfa4b961923">f2e2f64ddb20201061122bfa4b961923</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Reclamation">f2e2f64ddb20201061122bfa4b961923</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dea50bc9db60201061122bfa4b961908</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-16 16:54:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
